name: Soulkeeper (Maax)
description:
Somebody has to guide the Souls of the Dead.

You the grumpy Keeper and your 2 cheerful dogs have taken the task of caring for the dead souls upon yourself.

In the afterlife you steer your boat over the endless sky-lake while your friends race through the clouds.

Bring the souls securely through the golden Gate to beat the level.

I would be fulfilled with joy over some feedback, no matter how big or small :D

Enjoy and cheers to you!

Please play in full screen!
